title: (x) Barbapapa fonts - VAG Rounded, custom, Croissant {Michael A, Stephen, Yves}
content:
Hi.  
Im wondering what the names of these two fonts are.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [3384442077668.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20120104171505/http:/typophile.com/files/3384442077668.jpg) | 80.33 KB |
| [barbapapafont.JPG](http://web.archive.org/web/20120104171505/http:/typophile.com/files/barbapapafont.JPG) | 6.28 KB |
author: wieser

comments.content:
Hmmm. I believe the one titled, "barbapapafont.jpg" is either Frankfurter ...

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/frankfurter/](http://web.archive.org/web/20120104171505/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/frankfurter/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/frankfurter/")

or VAG Rounded ...

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/vag-rounded/](http://web.archive.org/web/20120104171505/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/vag-rounded/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/vag-rounded/")

Most likely the latter.
The smaller font at the top in the first one is [Croissant](http://web.archive.org/web/20120104171505/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?q=croissant).
Thank you for all the help.
